website_summaries.verdict: This bellows brings classic looks and flame-boosting air to your fireplace.
pros: Made from plyboard and black artificial leather with rivets
Brings your fire back to life with a few puffs

customer_reviews.title: blown away
customer_reviews.text: this product is great. From the smallest flicker of spark . It brought back the flame to what would have been just a smoldering pile of wood to a blazing fire. Very good bellow
customer_reviews.author: James Earl Boyce

customer_reviews.title: So nice I’m buying another.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice on fireplace tool set and blows plenty of air. I love it and am buying another one for my second fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: SAFARIPOLICE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a home with a wood burning fireplace - and a quickly discovered that once in a while you may want to adjust the wood and goose the heat. After a few nights of "blowing" on the logs and getting ash everywhere (not to mention getting slightly singed in the processed) I thought I'd try a bellows. The design of the bellows allows precision application of just the desired airflow exactly where you want it. I highly recommended the bellows method!
customer_reviews.author: S. David Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl and fire don’t mix...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit because it was highly-rated, and though is is well-made for the price, the vinyl material of the bellows simply does not hold up to the heat of a fire, even when used at a reasonable distance from the fire. On my unit, the vinyl became very soft from the heat and pulled away from the rivets that fasten it to the wooden paddles. This after only three uses. Returned, but did not exchange, as a vinyl fireplace bellows is just a bad idea for anything but a display piece. It will fail if exposed to heat. Bought a real leather bellows to replace, sorry cows...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very goid quilty. The only thing I would change is that I would make the leather that is by the metal tip covers with a metal plating. If you accidently touch something hot with it, it does get burnt but it doesn't damage it really so its nothing to worrie about
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice well made bellow.. we are happy with its looks and performance.
customer_reviews.author: L. DEKONING

customer_reviews.title: Ugly and amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is ugly as all get out. Hide it from your room when not in use. But it is fantastic for actual use. Large bellow lots of airflow quality tip. Beats all bellows I have used before
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: lasted 1 year. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Received this bellows in record time! Was very pleased in the packaging and quality of the product. Well built with good materials. Very reasonably priced. Tried it out within a couple days of receipt and it works better than I thought. Very powerful air stream and easy to aim at the coals. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This item will function perfectly well. I would not take it camping! It was not the quality I had expected from reading the other reviews and the product photo. The craftsmanship and more importantly, the materials...read that section closely, along with the fact that the two sides do not align and it handles as though it's easily breakable. I would not gift this item. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: The pin that's popping out. Not the only one, keep super glue on hand that is heat resistant. Pins pop out more than I'd really care to fixed used four times and leather is separating from wood due to pins not being placed properly. Looks cool but leather is cheap and already ripping from minimal use. Would like a refund without having the hassle of shipping back. I see myself getting a maximum 20 proper uses.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy E.

customer_reviews.title: Save your breath with this Quality Bellow  Q qq
customer_reviews.text: I needed help getting my woodbutner started. This Bellow it's the spark and fire going quick. This Bellow is much nicer than I expected. It's made of hardwood and leather.The craftsmanship is excellent. It is sturdy and is great for indoor fireplaces and woodburner and our outside fire ring. Also good for camping.
customer_reviews.author: J Mc

customer_reviews.title: IT BLOWS :)
customer_reviews.text: This hand bellows produces a very robust amount of air. Only downside was the brass 'tacks' holding the leather came out on the first one we purchased. This was probably due to my wife's zealousness in bellowing. I was able to 'Frankenstein' it and still use it on the chimnea on the back deck. The new one is used inside on the fireplace. I just recommend a slow and steady motion in using the bellows, this produces plenty of airflow to get your fire going.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Go with a better option
customer_reviews.text: Technically it still works. Only reason I haven't returned it. First night using at least 5 of the gold studs fell out. It has now been used for less than 3 weeks lightly each day and we are down another 5-10 studs. The "leather" material is peeling back because the studs aren't there. I will not repurchase once it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Brazell

customer_reviews.title: Fire bellow cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of use this fire bellow fell apart. The end metal piece came out and cannot be screwed back in. Also, the hanging strap came apart after two days. It’s cheaply made and I would save your money and get a better quality bellow.
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Bellows
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the bellows. They arrived in a very short time and are already proving very helpful as we have snow on the ground and cold temperatures. We use our wood-burning stove almost every day in the winter and using bellows sure beats blowing on the fire to get it going!
customer_reviews.author: Ione McKnight

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for Christmas for my sister/bro in law. They loved it. They have sent several texts on how well it works and how big the fire becomes after using it. So far no problems with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: trista4120

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a gift to my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to get this for her new home and fireplace. She now has all the tools she needs to keep her fireplace going and warm on the cold evenings. She's used it twice now and just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great at first  **Update- replacement is fantastic**
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, but after maybe a dozen uses the metal brackets have started coming off. **Update- The seller saw my initial review and sent me a replacement at no cost. As of now the replacement is working perfectly, and I am so thankful to the amazing customer service they provided**
customer_reviews.author: N. Custer

customer_reviews.title: Great bellows for the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this when he starts fires for his charcoal grill. He uses a charcoal tower and newspaper and the bellows to keep the fire hot till he gets it into the grill. He had one that wasn't as sturdy. I got this for him for Christmas 2 years ago and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once and it did fine. It doesn't look durable but it wasn't all that expensive. However it keeps husband from blowing on ember then inhaling smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Indyhorsewoman

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! My husband wanted a blow job for Christmas and I chose this one! I was so excited that I gave it to him early. He loved it!!! After only a minute or so he was all fired up!! Faster than usual even!! This will come in real handy over this cold winter.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have used the bellows frequently on an outdoor fire pit. After 6 months it shows no signs of wear, the "leatherette" isn't cracking or tearing anywhere. The metal end has not been effected by close proximity to heat and the wood looks perfect. Not the cheapest Bellows on Amazon but maybe you get what you pay for? 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PTShark

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and highly functional
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box it came in, sort of a flat box, and the first thing I checked was all the stitching around the edges, it was good, of course there weren't really stitches, actually ribbets kept it sealed. The material was nice and flexible, it seems best to keep it flat on a surface for strongest air flow, but it also worked with two hands. The wood looked real nice, probably nicer than even the advertised photo, sort of a dark color to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serious fireplace users must have
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as scheduled and seems to work well...replaced one that was around for generations..hope this one is too!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnieB

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, works great
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a bellow we had for 20+ years. It looks like this is well made and should last for years to come. It's large, as well, which is even better than what we had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: gave it as a gift to my husband and he loved it. probably one of the best gifts I've given. Too bad he was home the one day it came in the mail, lol, but he was still excited. Uses it often. Still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well built bellows. Would certainly buy another if I needed one.
customer_reviews.text: I have an insert in the fireplace on the ground floor and I can’t believe I waited so long to get one of these. It really helps with stoking process. This one has a metal tip that stands up to the heat.
customer_reviews.author: George N. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: I'd say it's a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.text: I mean... They're an inexpensive tool, so you are going to get what you pay for here. That being said they are pretty good, I can see a few small problem areas that are potential failure points in the future, but they should last a fair amount of time. At the price point and estimated longevity, I would say it's a worthwhile purchase if you need done decent bellows.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this item The “leather” is vinyl, and came apart from the wood after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: TheCoasties

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This thing blows and that's a good thing. What can you say, it does what it's supposed to do. Seems well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We just loved it. It's real wood and leather. Works great for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I returned two bellows without using them. They simply looked two flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing. We have a wood stove for heat and the bellow easily starts up a small amount of coals. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product & pretty design. I would absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: T. Haapapuro

customer_reviews.title: It blows!
customer_reviews.text: No, seriously... it really blows. Very good product for those moments when the fire's too hot to put your face in there to blow.
customer_reviews.author: Geddy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and does the job. It is built like a tank!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sarp

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect replacement for our 20 year old bellows.
customer_reviews.author: Japonce

customer_reviews.title: Good to put on the fire, not to blow air in to it.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on the advert saying this was made in China, pretty misleading. Very low quality product, poorly place’s rivets, terrible craftsmanship on the vinyl. Bronze casting poor quality with offset air hole. Makes a wheezing noise when being used. Does move enough air of fast enough. Basically a hunk of junk.
customer_reviews.author: jessica zevalkink

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: wood finish was uneven and grainy. While I realize it was not the most expensive, I believe expecting a wooden product to be finished properly is not out of line. I certainly would not give it as a gift. Poor craftsmanship speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Well made functions great.
customer_reviews.text: Function fantastically. Last one I bought (different brand) barely blew and fell apart in 2 years. This one is very sturdy, looks great abs creates a massive wind tunnel!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This pushes out some serious air. Only thing you need to do is not to leave the bellows to close to the flames or fire pit. The fake leather will melt and leave a hole. For the cost, this bellows is great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. Nice material. Heavy weight so it doesn’t feel like it will fall apart and is actually pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Kerstin Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yet functional addition
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that came up when I gave this a a gift was it's appearance. It looks classy and striking when hanging next to a fireplace. Functionally it beats having to fan a fire and risk sending ash into every corner of the room. Seems well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to your fireplace hearth.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. High quality, beautiful wood. Sorry it took me 10 years to get this.
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted me to get this so I wouldn’t have to blow at the fireplace anymore lol. Needless to say, it works great! I can save my breath now 😬
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works great on fire
customer_reviews.text: Git this as a gift for my neighbor and it is a big hit! Looks great and provides great air flow to really get the fire in his chininea going fast. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Modelski

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, works well and snazzy looking for a bellow.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice!
customer_reviews.text: This will help you so much with your wood burning fireplace. I got tied of blowing with my mouth or swatting with some news paper. This is focused forced air and it’ll help you get that fire burning hot!
customer_reviews.author: Rey Puente

customer_reviews.title: wooden bellows for woodburning fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This bellows has worked well at aerating the fire and wood to begin burning in our fireplace. It has saved my husband's eyebrows and the small amount of hair he has left, as he no longer sticks his whole head into the fireplace to blow on the flames. Wish I had purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline defouw

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: use it for keeping my fire alive. Don't know how to get along without it
customer_reviews.author: jack isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband and he LOVES it! Perfect for our many fires we have during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out and it really works good.....be careful not to get it too close
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The bellows seems as if it is nice craftsmanship. I bought it as a gift so I cannot give any further comments.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! Looks great hanging beside the fireplace and much better than having to lean down and blow on the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this. Very well made, nice & sturdy. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The hanging strap broke after one day. Update: they were quick to offer an apology and a replacement strap. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk bardo

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our cheap bellows that fell apart after a year or two of light use. I'm glad we spent the extra money on a higher quality item. Did not disappoint. Good quality and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sky Mom

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the quality and workmanship of this item. It was shipped promptly and received in excellent condition. We would recommend to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The bellows arrived with a hole in the leather siding.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Build a ROARING FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it! I can get my fireplace roaring with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: JimA

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in a long while
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself from hyperventilating when you try to start / stoke a fire in your fireplace. It works effortlessly, so much so I sometimes find myself playing with it to get my fire burning as hot as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks as expected! It started squeaking a little when we compress it but I can't say that's a fault haha. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Slovak

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husbands birthday. Not as big as I hoped but does a nice job. He loves using for the backyard fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Erinlei

customer_reviews.title: Great Bellow
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this bellow, but honestly it is great. A must have if you own a fireplace/insert/woodstove. Dont pass it up, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy of 4

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bellows with my wood stove and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality item!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my son; found it to be better than the one I own and a little jealous but glad to add it to his home fireplace on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the craftsmanship of the product and it works just like I had hoped. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how long it will last but so far it works great
customer_reviews.author: Barry Iddins

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a present. It works great and the quality is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: This bellow is well crafted and moves an adequate volume of air for that purpose. Just what we were looking for. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lau Chi Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great gift winter months
customer_reviews.text: Threw my old one out!! So far so good- this is keeping my fires going!! Live it!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Tessmer

customer_reviews.title: Bellows
customer_reviews.text: It is my husband’s favorite toy -I mean tool!- to stoke the fire with. I’m not sure how effective it really is but it sure does look good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Curette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Old timey but very functional. I use it for the fireplace and to stoke wood fires for meat smoking.
customer_reviews.author: JTrussell7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bellows!
customer_reviews.text: These bellows have made a huge difference in the ease of building fire in the wood stove. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift to my husband
customer_reviews.text: Great size and design. Looks beautiful hanging on our fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Kelly Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Looks Real Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a person with a Large Fireplace. And they said it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H

customer_reviews.title: Only for very small fires, 1-3 logs
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t quite as large as I had anticipated, did it’s job well, for its size. Looking to buy a bigger one though.
customer_reviews.author: justin daniel hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Used for home wood stove. Works great and looks well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, works great for me, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: James Hilf

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we carry it in our camper and use it around the campfire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use the bellow to help create a hotter fire faster when using my Green Egg barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool. Safer and more efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Husband doesn't look like he's been tending dragon eggs anymore. No more singed beards or mustaches in this house! Bellow is pretty, better looking than I thought it would be for the price. Real wood. Fake leather. Real metal tip. Hangs nicely with my other fireplace tools, was worried it would be too long but it's the same size as my other tools so it hangs perfectly. Blows more air than it looks like it would, and really makes the fire roar back to life. Much more efficient than anything else I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: MissusKMSmith

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking they were made in the US. They aren't. They cost more than other bellows and I thought they would be a higher quality product. They aren't. I can't tell if it had real leather. They seem to work, but the quality isn't worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different bellows for my fireplace about a year ago and while it was highly rated and an "amazon favorite", it fell apart. Literally. The metal nozzle fell out of the front. This was with normal recreational fireplace usage, like an evening fire 3-4 days a week. THIS appears to be well made and is very functional. It gets a sluggish fire rolling along quickly. Hopefully it will last longer that the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonpaul Okal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, decorative metal gromets were not well attached in some places, we just reattached them, it does not effect the product’s usefulness. Would recommend to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: strychnine

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking.  Just buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bellows I’ve ever owned (in 70 years). They deliver superb air volume and force. They are also beautifully constructed. I’m giving away my 2 old ones. 2 month followup. After using these powerful bellows on several fires in our fireplace, I'm even happier with them than when they arrived. They have great air displacement!!
customer_reviews.author: trees4277

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.  (upholstery tacks fall out)
customer_reviews.text: There is no way I am buying a 80$ bellow, this is the right price.. nothing special.. Some of the tacks fell out so I'm buying some more to fix it, not a huge issue, it still works. But where the leather folds over they should use a tack with a longer shank so it doesn't fall out easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. The leather part ripped in about a month of use. I taped it up and it works ok. It’s a good price if you just want to try one out before purchasing an expensive one. Or great if you rarely use. If you want one that will last just buy a quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product! Strong leather, and button binding. If you use it correctly it works great! We burn through about a cord of wood every year and this little guy gets the job done for keeping the fire going. Definitely recommend A++
customer_reviews.author: Safety

customer_reviews.title: Effective Bellows
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of blowing air to promote more fire in our fireplace. I would have given it a 5 star, but the strap connecting the two pieces is thin leather, and I am afraid it will break over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D French

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy that we bought this I don’t know why we never bought one sooner . Does what it supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley  F

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, looks upscale, works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made, and very attractive, and did the job very well! No more smoke in our face from trying to blow on the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bellows, worked pretty good for about 2 weeks before the tacks that hold the leather came off.
customer_reviews.author: fintroller

customer_reviews.title: durable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband got tired from puffing like the big bad wolf to get the embers going. The bellows looks good, appears durable, and saves breath and dizziness. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Debable

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: We desperately needed a new bellows and this one did the trick. It helps us start up our wood burning stove with little effort. Well worth the price. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Large enough to be used as desired.
customer_reviews.author: BTP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little scared off from some of the reviews, but appearance and ease of use were great! Love the leather and wood—very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Erilyn4

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my husband for Christmas! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle fell off. It was not securely attached.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to stoke a barbecue pit. The nozzle fell off, and seemed to have not been attached well. Several of the tacks holding it on were quite loose.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Kent

customer_reviews.title: Get your fire going!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves to use this to get the fire going. It’s giftable but I don’t know I saw the shipping packaging. It’s a great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: MrsBYoung

product_meta.title: AMAGABELI GARDEN & HOME Fireplace Bellows 19"x 8" Large Wood Air Blower Cast Nozzle for Outdoor Camping BBQ Grill Chimney Hand Bellow Pump Pit Barbeque Fire Tools Accessories with Hanging Strap
feature_bullets: COMPACT & STURDY: Dimensions 19" X 8", beautiful wood color finish, zinc-cast nozzle, crafted from ply board and black artificial leather look with rivets. Perfect handheld sized for BBQ barbecue tool kit and small enough to hang next to the fireplace, chimney and wood stove.

SIMPLE TO USE & IDEAL GIFT: Bellows draw in air through a hole in the bottom and force it out through a nozzle. This eliminates the need to blow directly into a fire, thus reducing the risks of burns. Bellows make an ideal housewarming gift for a home with a fireplace.

DECORATIVE: A fireplace bellow is both decorative and useful. Traditionally design has become more of a piece of art. It can add a decorative touch to any wood burning fireplace and create a more rustic setting, make for some nice home decor on the wall.
NO NEED ASSEMBLED & EASY TO STORE: No need assembly required. This well made and attractive blower works as expected and is easy to store by hanging on the fireplace tool stand.
CUSTOMER CARE: We are dedicated to provide premium products for you and offer impeccable customer care to you. Don’t wait any longer and just enjoy your ideal products today!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars439 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
